about_the_game:
Wing It
Take flight in the world of bird conservation!

Welcome to Wing It, a relaxing and rewarding simulation game where you manage your very own bird sanctuary. As the caretaker of Bird Haven, your mission is to provide a safe and enriching environment for birds from all around the world. From common sparrows to rare and endangered species, your sanctuary is home to them all! Unlock new birds, care for their unique needs, and watch your sanctuary thrive.

Key Features:

🕊 Bird Encyclopedia
Discover a wide variety of bird species! The Bird Encyclopedia keeps track of each species you encounter, giving you detailed information about them. Some birds are common and easy to find, while others are rare treasures that require extra effort to unlock.

🌍 Explore the World
Travel through diverse biomes, each filled with unique bird species and hidden treasures. Unlock new locations, discover new bird species, and bring them back to Bird Haven to expand your sanctuary.

🚗 Vehicle Collection
Upgrade your transportation to explore further and bring back more birds. From rugged off-road vehicles to colorful hot air balloons, each mode of transport helps you reach new environments and bring in rare birds.

🍎 Feed and Care for Your Birds
Customize your sanctuary's food options to cater to the specific diets of each bird. Keep your birds well-fed and happy to increase their lifespans and encourage breeding within your sanctuary.

🎨 Decorate and Customize
Personalize your sanctuary with unique decorations and accessories! Use driftwood, bird nests, statues, and telescopes to create a beautiful, natural environment that reflects your love for bird conservation.

Gameplay Highlights:

  • Unlockable Content: Each new species and decor item is unlockable through exploration, achievements, and in-game currency, providing a sense of progress and discovery.

  • Relaxing Simulation Experience: Immerse yourself in a relaxing gameplay loop with beautiful visuals, gentle background music, and ambient nature sounds.

  • Resource Management: Keep track of your resources, such as food and funds, to make sure your sanctuary thrives.

  • Bird Care and Happiness: Balance the birds’ comfort and environment to maximize their happiness and longevity in the sanctuary.

  • Steam Achievements and Trading Cards: Earn achievements and collect trading cards as you build the ultimate bird sanctuary.

Are you ready to spread your wings and bring bird conservation to life? Embark on a journey in Wing It, and build a sanctuary that every bird would love to call home!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • VR Support: NA
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 3 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU (NVIDIA GTX 960 / AMD Radeon R7 370 or better)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • VR Support: NA

short_description: Wing It is a relaxing simulation game where you build and manage a bird sanctuary. Discover, care for, and unlock diverse bird species, customize your haven with unique decor, and explore new locations to expand your sanctuary. Create a paradise for your feathered friends!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Turkish
